name: get_mark_price_kline
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bybit.
Tool description: Public Data Bybit. Cryptocurrency prices and charts. Derivatives, Futures, Spot, USDC Contract
API description: Fetches the mark price kline data for a specified trading symbol within a given time range and interval.

start.description: The start timestamp for the result in milliseconds.

category.description: The derivatives products category. Currently available categories include 'linear' and 'inverse' (inverse futures).

end.description: The end timestamp for the result in milliseconds.

limit.description: The limit for data size per page, with a maximum of 200. Defaults to 200 pieces of data per page.
